original_text: The Pharisees heard the crowd whispering such things about him. Then the chief priests and the Pharisees sent temple guards to arrest him.
korean_text: 예수에 대하여 무리가 수군거리는 것이 바리새인들에게 들린지라 대제사장들과 바리새인들이 그를 잡으려고 아랫사람들을 보내니

sentences.original_text: The Pharisees heard the crowd whispering
Then the chief priests and the Pharisees
sent temple guards to arrest him
